alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 6:41PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL AITKIN, SOUTHWESTERN ST. LOUIS AND NORTHWESTERN CARLTON COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM CDT... At 639 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tamarack, or 12 miles southeast of Big Sandy Lake, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cromwell and Fond Du Lac Band Sawyer Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for northeastern and east central Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin
